channel.title: Morning Somewhere
channel.itunes:author: Burnie Burns and Ashley Burns
channel.description:
Join Burnie Burns and Ashley Burns every weekday for a coffee-fueled morning discussion about what's happening in our world.

Linkdumps for every episode on our website:
https://www.morningsomewhere.com

Support us on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/morningsomewhere
